Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
My name is {!User.FirstName} with LegalZoom and I am contacting you on behalf of our Strategic Business Partners, (PARTNER).
LegalZoom is your premier online legal resource and I am reaching out to you today to make sure that you and your business are well protected – In fact, thousands of our business owners have benefited from our legal plan.
Here’s a quick run-down of our service:
For a low annual or monthly fee (as low as $23.99/month), you can set up your attorney consultation on a range of business, intellectual property and personal matters. Please keep in mind each legal matter must be unique with the typical attorney consultation lasting 30 minutes.
Benefits include:
• Attorney advice and consultations. Speak with an experienced attorney on an unlimited number of new legal matters • Tax professional advice and consultations. Speak with an experienced tax professional on an unlimited number of new tax issues • Attorney drafted letters. Your attorney can draft legal letters on your behalf • Unlimited access to LegalZoom legal forms. Download hundreds of blank legal forms for business or personal use • 1 Free copyright per month, all you pay is the Federal filing fee • Access to CreditAlert Plus from Dun & Bradstreet Credibility Corp. Establish & monitor your Business Credit Profile. • 25% savings on additional attorney services. Get significant savings on additional attorney work if you need it • 20% savings on additional tax services. • 10% savings on any LegalZoom legal documents. Get any LegalZoom business or personal documents at a discount
*Excludes Patent-related matters, violent crimes.
Please call me directly and I will be happy to discuss this service in more detail. Thank you for choosing LegalZoom and have a great day.
I look forward to speaking with you,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} {!User.CompanyName} {!User.Address} {!User.Phone} ext. {!User.Extension}
